titles: Presvyteros diplēs timēs axios, or, The true dignity of St. Paul's elder exemplified in the life of ... Mr. Owen Stockton ... with a collection of his observations, experiences and evidences recorded by his own hand : to which is added his funeral sermon / by John Fairfax ...
author: Fairfax, John, 1623-1700.
publisher: Printed by H.H. for Tho. Parkhurst ...,
notes: "Mors triumphata, or, The saints victory over death ... opened in a funeral sermon" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
